content: That sounds like a great idea, as long as it's a reward that motivates and excites you personally! One important thing to consider is budgeting for your shopping spree ahead of time, so you don't overspend and undo your cleaning efforts. You could also consider setting specific cleaning goals to achieve each week or accumulate points for each completed task, and once you reach a certain point total, you can reward yourself with a shopping spree. This can help you stay motivated and focused on your cleaning routines while also giving you something to look forward to as a reward. Whatever reward you choose, make sure it's something that inspires and refreshes you, to help you stay motivated to reach your goals.
